relationships.description: Harry might run into Hagrid in Hogsmeade.
Ron and Hermione are friends of Harry.
Harry saw Viktor Krum emerge onto the deck of Durmstrang ship.
Viktor Krum fell into the lake.
Harry thought Viktor Krum was mad for jumping into the lake.
